name: Distant Treasures
description:
Distant Treasures is a story-driven adventure game in which you play as Sebastian in a mysterious room that you happened to wake up in. You are not sure why or how you got there, but your objective becomes figuring out a way to escape the room and get back home.

Controls

WASD - Movement

SPACE - Interact with Room Objects

E - Collect Items/Notes

Q - Change Jukebox Music

TAB - Open/Hide Inventory

LEFT CLICK - Choose Interaction Options/View and Exit Notes
